channel.title: How do i make npc's tradable ? :s
channel.description: i have made an npc.... 1 customer... and 1 nulodion.... the customer doesn't have a trade option...it's just a talk to... and when i talk to her... nothing happens???? can someone help me??? :S

item.title: How do i make npc's tradable ? :s
item.dc:creator: @logging logging
item.description:
@logging wrote:

oh cheers man[br][size=1]Posted on: January 13, 2007, 10:47:33 AM[/size][hr]well because i kno nothing about this… can u tell me what to do??? i wanna make that lancelot guy the pot shop…? selling like 100 of each pot… supers… so how do i do it lol?

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make npc's tradable ? :s
item.dc:creator: @ancientmage ancientmage
item.description:
@ancientmage wrote:

u got to make them in to a shop by opening the shop.cfg and making the shop in there with items in it then giving the npc the shop number that u make in shop.cfg
